hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: If anyone hears him who makes the call to prayer and is not prevented from joining the congregation by any excuse--he was asked what an excuse consisted of and replied that it was fear or illness--the prayer he offers will not be accepted from him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي التَّشْدِيدِ فِي تَرْكِ الْجَمَاعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Severity Of Not Attending The Congregational Prayer
